title: Suzlon sells headquarters for Rs 440 crore, leases it back for up to five years
description: Suzlon Energy has sold its Pune headquarters, One Earth, for Rs 440 crore to OE Business Park Pvt Ltd and leased it back for up to five years. This move is part of Suzlon's strategy to monetize non-core assets and reinvest in its core business, supporting its growth and expanding orderbook.
